input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: HP_ServiceCenter, BMC_Remedyforce
Note - Tasks cannot be created independently, without a change request associated with it in BMC Remedy AR System. The Create Tasks workflow can only be used by other ITSM systems such as HP Service Center or BMC Remedyforce.
Unsupported Value(s): BMC_AR_System ServiceNow

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The task concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The task concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
An XML document containing input of failed tasks.
String Value - Count of successful tasks.
String Value - Count of failed tasks.
Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully. Valid values: success, failure.
A process specific string that explains the value of success status

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <entity-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">task</xsl:text> </entity-type> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">create-change-task</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys> <task-number> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="task-number"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </task-number> </keys> <instance> <header> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="task-number"]/text() != '0'"> <task-number> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="task-number"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </task-number> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="category"]/text() != '0'"> <category> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="category"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </category> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="status"]/text() != '0'"> <status> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="status"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </status> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="assignee-to"]/text() != '0'"> <assignee-to> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="assignee-to"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </assignee-to> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="assignee-dept"]/text() != '0'"> <assignee-dept> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="assignee-dept"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </assignee-dept> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="coordinator"]/text() != '0'"> <coordinator> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="coordinator"]/text() != '0'" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </coordinator> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="coordinator-phone"]/text() != '0'"> <coordinator-phone> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="coordinator-phone"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </coordinator-phone> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="planned-start-date"]/text() != '0'"> <planned-start-date> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="planned-start-date"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </planned-start-date> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="planned-end-date"]/text() != '0'"> <planned-end-date> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="planned-end-date"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </planned-end-date> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="reason"]/text() != '0'"> <reason> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="reason"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </reason> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="phase"]/text() != '0'"> <phase> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="phase"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </phase> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="date-entered"]/text() != '0'"> <date-entered> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="date-entered"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </date-entered> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="open"]/text() != '0'"> <open> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="open"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Boolean</xsl:text> </type> </open> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="originator"]/text() != '0'"> <originator> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="originator"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </originator> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="parent-change"]/text() != '0'"> <parent-change> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="parent-change"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </parent-change> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="close-time"]/text() != '0'"> <close-time> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="close-time"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Duration</xsl:text> </type> </close-time> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="company"]/text() != '0'"> <company> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="company"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </company> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="SLAAgreement-i-d"]/text() != '0'"> <SLAAgreement-i-d> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="SLAAgreement-i-d"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </SLAAgreement-i-d> </xsl:if> </header> <description-structure> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <description> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="description"]/text() != '0'"> <description> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="description"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </description> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="task-description-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <task-description-line2> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="task-description-line2"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </task-description-line2> </xsl:if> </description> </description-structure> <middle> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="product-number"]/text() != '0'"> <product-number> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="product-number"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </product-number> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text() != '0'"> <configuration-item> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </configuration-item> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="location"]/text() != '0'"> <location> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="location"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </location> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc1"]/text() != '0'"> <misc1> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc1"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc1> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc2"]/text() != '0'"> <misc2> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc2"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc2> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc3"]/text() != '0'"> <misc3> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc3"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc3> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc4"]/text() != '0'"> <misc4> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc4"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc4> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc5"]/text() != '0'"> <misc5> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc5"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc5> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc6"]/text() != '0'"> <misc6> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc6"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc6> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc7"]/text() != '0'"> <misc7> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc7"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc7> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc8"]/text() != '0'"> <misc8> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc8"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc8> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc9"]/text() != '0'"> <misc9> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc9"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc9> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc10"]/text() != '0'"> <misc10> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc10"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </misc10> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="brief-description"]/text() != '0'"> <brief-description> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="brief-description"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </brief-description> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="downtime-start"]/text() != '0'"> <downtime-start> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="downtime-start"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </downtime-start> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="downtime-end"]/text() != '0'"> <downtime-end> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="downtime-end"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </downtime-end> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="installation-date"]/text() != '0'"> <installation-date> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="installation-date"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </installation-date> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array1-line1"]/text() != '0' or //field[@name="misc-array1-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <misc-array1> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <misc-array1> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array1-line1"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc-array1-line1"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array1-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc-array1-line2"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> </misc-array1> </misc-array1> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array2-line1"]/text() != '0' or //field[@name="misc-arry2-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <misc-array2> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <misc-array2> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array2-line1"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc-array2-line1"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array2-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc-array2-line2"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> </misc-array2> </misc-array2> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="requested-units"]/text() != '0'"> <requested-units> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="requested-units"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </requested-units> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="estimate-price"]/text() != '0'"> <estimate-price> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="estimate-price"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </estimate-price> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="estimated-delivery"]/text() != '0'"> <estimated-delivery> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="estimated-delivery"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </estimated-delivery> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="estimated-delivery"]/text() != '0'"> <estimated-delivery> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="estimated-delivery"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </estimated-delivery> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="actual-cost"]/text() != '0'"> <actual-cost> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="actual-cost"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </actual-cost> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="actual-price"]/text() != '0'"> <actual-price> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="actual-price"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </actual-price> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="SLABreached"]/text() != '0'"> <SLABreached> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="SLABreached"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </SLABreached> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="c-i-down"]/text() != '0'"> <c-i-down> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="c-i-down"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </c-i-down> </xsl:if> </middle> <close> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="completion-code"]/text() != '0'"> <completion-code> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="completion-code"]/text()" /> </value> </completion-code> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="closing-comments"]/text() != '0'"> <closing-comments> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <closing-comments> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="closing-comments-line1"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="closing-comments-line1"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="closing-comments-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="closing-comments-line2"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> </closing-comments> </closing-comments> </xsl:if> </close> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="urgency"]/text() != '0'"> <urgency> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="urgency"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </urgency> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="initial-assessment"]/text() != '0'"> <initial-assessment> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="initial-assessment"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </initial-assessment> </xsl:if> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//item/metadata/status" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The update was unsuccessful for Task ID: ", .)
concat("The update of Task data was completed successfully for ", .)
concat("Unable to create task because of the following: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <object> <xsl:for-each select="//object"> <type> <xsl:value-of select="'${o type}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </type> <xsl:copy-of select="./*" /> </xsl:for-each> </object> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create task because of the following: ", .)

documentation.description: This workflow will update a task. Any data provided in concept element fields will be updated.
